NAME: Avishek Somani - CA, CS, MBA
ABOUT:
Avishek is part of the Dalmia Bharat Group - a conglomerate where he manages mergers and acquisitions and corporate finance. His role includes scouting for M&A deals, finding business value for the company, due diligence and implementation of acquisition strategy. Currently he is heading the Finance & Controlling function of recently acquired company in Bochum. He is based out of Germany.

Avishek started his career with an audit firm in Eastern India, where he advised clients across sectors on audit and finance transactions. Later on, he joined M&A team of HCL Technologies Limited and executed various acquisitions across US, Europe and APAC. Of 8 years of work experience, 2 years includes working in Europe.

Avishek is a commerce graduate from Calcutta University, a qualified Chartered Accountant (ICAI) and Company Secretary (ICSI). He also holds Post-Graduate Diploma in Management (MBA) from IMT Ghaziabad, a premier B-school in India with 3 months experience of studying at Kedge Business School in Marseille, France.

Specialties: Mergers & Acquisitions, Due Diligence, Corporate Strategy, Financial Planning and Analysis
